timeline.message:
Fix by using compactSignedLong.

timeline.bodyText:
This will break backward compatibility. Old code does not know how to deal with version 1.
Do this using a revision.
timeline.author: andreipaduroiu

replies.bodyText:
This bug prevents serialization with the older version of the client for -1L.
I used a new version number since the serializing via RevisionDataOutput#writeCompactSignedLong (new change) cannot be deserialized via RevisionedDataOutput#readCompactLong (old change).
I have also added a test to verify if serialization via version 0 can be deserialized via version 1.
replies.author: shrids

replies.bodyText: Done, I have updated the PR to ensure it is compatible either ways by using revision.
replies.author: shrids
